m_szDocSumamry: Home / SCI-TECH / Concept cars in CES 2016 Concept cars in CES 2016 Posted on The most iconic automobile brands showed their concept cars for future in CES 2016 are below.   A Toyota FCV Plus, a hydrogen fuel-cell concept car.   A real-time 3D map, generated by LiDAR sensors, is shown on a monitor.   A 2016 Chevrolet Volt is displayed.   LiDAR sensors are shown on the roof of a Ford Fusion Hybrid. The sensors create a real-time 3D map of the vehicle’s surroundings.   Journalists look over the 2017 Chevrolet Bolt EV. The car will have a 200-mile range and cost about $30,000, said General Motors
